short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Record screen, tabs, window, and track viewers of your videos when you share.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Record your screen with a video bubble. The popup presents an overlay of video bubble on the browser screen or tab you'd be recording. It's also possible to switch tabs during recording.
